attachments.fallback:
patch 8.1.0536: file time test fails when using NFS

Problem:    File time test fails when using NFS.
Solution:   Use three file times instead of localtim(). (James McCoy,
            closes #3618)

patch 8.1.0536: file time test fails when using NFS

Problem:    File time test fails when using NFS.
Solution:   Use three file times instead of localtim(). (James McCoy,
            closes #3618)
